trans-unit.source: Cheat sheet for an automated data pipeline for Azure Machine Learning predictions | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Cheat sheet for an automated data pipeline for Azure Machine Learning predictions | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: A printable cheat sheet that shows you how to set up an automated data pipeline to your Azure Machine Learning web service whether your data is on-premise, streaming, in Azure, or in a third-party cloud service.
trans-unit.target: A printable cheat sheet that shows you how to set up an automated data pipeline to your Azure Machine Learning web service whether your data is on-premise, streaming, in Azure, or in a third-party cloud service.

trans-unit.source: Cheat sheet for an automated data pipeline for Azure Machine Learning predictions
trans-unit.target: Cheat sheet for an automated data pipeline for Azure Machine Learning predictions

trans-unit.source: The **Microsoft Azure Machine Learning automated data pipeline cheat sheet** helps you navigate through the technology you can use to get your data to your Machine Learning web service where it can be scored by your predictive analytics model.
trans-unit.target: The **Microsoft Azure Machine Learning automated data pipeline cheat sheet** helps you navigate through the technology you can use to get your data to your Machine Learning web service where it can be scored by your predictive analytics model.

trans-unit.source: Depending on whether your data is on-premises, in the cloud, or streaming real-time, there are different mechanisms available to move the data to your web service endpoint for scoring.
trans-unit.target: Depending on whether your data is on-premises, in the cloud, or streaming real-time, there are different mechanisms available to move the data to your web service endpoint for scoring.

trans-unit.source: This cheat sheet walks you through the decisions you'll need to make and offers links to articles that will help you develop your solution.
trans-unit.target: This cheat sheet walks you through the decisions you'll need to make and offers links to articles that will help you develop your solution.

trans-unit.source: Download the Machine Learning automated data pipeline cheat sheet
trans-unit.target: Download the Machine Learning automated data pipeline cheat sheet

trans-unit.source: Once you download the cheat sheet, you can print it in tabloid size (11 x 17 in.).
trans-unit.target: Once you download the cheat sheet, you can print it in tabloid size (11 x 17 in.).

trans-unit.source: Download the cheat sheet here: **[Microsoft Azure Machine Learning automated data pipeline cheat sheet](http://download.microsoft.com/download/C/C/7/CC726F8B-2E6F-4C20-9B6F-AFBEE8253023/microsoft-machine-learning-operationalization-cheat-sheet_v1.pdf)**
trans-unit.target: Download the cheat sheet here: **[Microsoft Azure Machine Learning automated data pipeline cheat sheet](http://download.microsoft.com/download/C/C/7/CC726F8B-2E6F-4C20-9B6F-AFBEE8253023/microsoft-machine-learning-operationalization-cheat-sheet_v1.pdf)**

trans-unit.target: More help with Machine Learning Studio

trans-unit.source: For an overview of Microsoft Azure Machine Learning, see [Introduction to machine learning on Microsoft Azure](machine-learning-what-is-machine-learning.md).
trans-unit.target: For an overview of Microsoft Azure Machine Learning, see [Introduction to machine learning on Microsoft Azure](machine-learning-what-is-machine-learning.md).

trans-unit.source: For an explanation of how to deploy a scoring web service, see [Deploy an Azure Machine Learning web service](machine-learning-publish-a-machine-learning-web-service.md).
trans-unit.target: For an explanation of how to deploy a scoring web service, see [Deploy an Azure Machine Learning web service](machine-learning-publish-a-machine-learning-web-service.md).

trans-unit.source: For a discussion of how to consume a scoring web service, see [How to consume an Azure Machine Learning web service that has been deployed from a Machine Learning experiment](machine-learning-consume-web-services.md).
trans-unit.target: For a discussion of how to consume a scoring web service, see [How to consume an Azure Machine Learning web service that has been deployed from a Machine Learning experiment](machine-learning-consume-web-services.md).
